title: Failed to launch RADS\system\rads_user_kernel.exe
body: Hello, whenever I click the League icon I get this message: Failed to launch RADS\system\rads_user_kernel.exe . I've already reinstalled and restarted my computer. It didnt work. Please help me out! :)

replies.body: Errors like this can be due to a permissions issue with your OS or something else that's blocking the patcher from launching.  Our [Permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide can help out in this case with a list of instructions to configure your settings and allow access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
